== pllist.m ==
Shortcut for function get_plotlistdef(MASTER,'.')

[http://guillaumemaze.googlecode.com/svn/trunk/matlab/routines/pllist.m Download here]

% pllist Shortcut for function get_plotlistdef(MASTER,'.')
%
% [LIST] = pllist(MASTER,[SUBDIR])
% 
% Simply execute:
%	get_plotlistdef(MASTER,SUBDIR);
%
% See also:
%	get_plotlistdef
%
% Created: 2009-08-25.
